name: Phase (ouijahija)
description:
This project was made in 2019 during two weeks by one person. It was an assignment for applying for the Zurich School of Arts (Zürcher Hochschule der Künste / ZHdK).

It's a 2-4 Person local network multiplayer game for PC where you (robot time magicians) fight each other in short 10 minute matches for the multidimensional title of WINNER. The catch is: You don't know where your opponent is! You only see his where he was 1 second ago as a shadow and vice versa. This means you can't just shoot at what you see, because you will miss and betray your own position. Rather you have to anticipate where your oppent could be, based on the position of his shadow.
